name: Sarah Philip
description: seeking for a serious and long term relationship and more. I would want to meet a man who is responsible, respectful, caring and capture my heart and knows how to treat a woman, a man who will cherish me and be willing to share the rest of my life with greatest joys and sorrows. A man who’s willing to love me unconditionally, whom is kind, sincere, honest, passionate, loyal, sense of humor, loving and wants a lifetime of passion. And also knows how to have fun but can be serious when needed. I’m honest and down to earth person and very romantic, I ve respect for men and have sense of humors good morals and looking for the same. I love to laugh I believe that laughter shows a lot about someone’s personality If you’re not laughing on a regular basis, then you re not enjoying life. I love to play football, go boating, reading books, and do just about anything outdoors. I love birds. Are you the one?
